posts.post_content: I have a very nice Southern Leaguer for sale. William Otey. See front and back scans for further details. Asking $250.00/OBO. I think it is worthy of at least a PSA 4, if not higher, but that is no guarantee on the grading, as we all know that is very subjective. If you would like a scan of the back, send an e-mail to [url]billscheffel@yahoo.com[/url]
